note:
I am Ilias Tsopelas (hence the Medium profile), a storytelling enthusiast. I like to write about storytelling media (films, TV, books, etc.) and analyze themes and topics through the lens of a specific story. You won't see me writing a review anytime soon. I lean heavily into Sci-Fi of all forms, and I love visual media in particular.

In my free time, I happen to be a mechanical engineer.
